#summary ByteCode Libraries

= Introduction =

DecoJer uses multiple ByteCode Libraries:

  == JVM ByteCode ==
  * JBoss Javassist
  * ObjectWeb ASM

  == Dalvik ByteCode ==
  * smali (dexlib)
  * dex2jar (dex-reader)

= Details =

  * DOM-like: Javassist and smali
  * SAX-like: ASM and dex2jar (uses ASM)
